name: FIT Information Technologies
description:
FIT Information Technologies – years of experience in development of information systems and development of custom applications and software for various purposes.

Among our client are international companies, corporations, small- and medium-sized business, and non-profit organizations. And we are interested in a long-term cooperation.
FIT Ltd employs the following well-known web technologies to provide unique, quality software development solutions:
-    ASP.NET, classic, MVC, C#, MSSQL
-    PHP,  CodeIgniter, Laravel, MySql, Postgre SQL...
-    HTML, HTML5, CSS2.1, CSS3, Responsive, JavaScript, JQuery, Jquery Mobile, JQuery UI, AngularJs, Bootstrap...
-       Python/Django
-    CMS WordPress
-       MS Azure, AWS
-       SVN, Github

We develop software and technology solutions specifically designed for your business can help your business work smarter.
